kw.name: Log To Console
kw.arg: ********* Establishing connection with the remote server ***********
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Open Connection

kw.name: Login
kw.doc: Logs into the SSH server with the given ``username`` and ``password``.
